dict.string: ProjectZ requires accessibility access to monitor clipboard changes, detect cursor position, and provide contextual suggestions based on your current activity.
ProjectZ requires microphone access to listen to your voice commands for querying your clipboard history.
ProjectZ requires camera access for visual features.
ProjectZ requires screen recording access to capture screen content for OCR text extraction when you press Option+V.
ProjectZ needs access to your calendar to help you check your schedule, find free time, and answer questions about your upcoming events.
ProjectZ needs access to your reminders to help you track tasks and to-dos.
ProjectZ needs access to your contacts to find email addresses for scheduling calendar events.
